article_title: What DC has in store for Alaska in 2016
article_text: "We've got a lot going on with microgrids, as we know, and I want my colleagues to see what life is like in an Arctic environment. While Bethel is much south of the Arctic Circle, when you look at how the Arctic is defined on our map, it includes that coastline there," Murkowski said. "I'm hopeful that we will not only get some members of the committee out there but also some interesting guests to testify. We have our invites out."

article_metadata.description: A new year brings new possibility for Alaskas lawmakers, who have their eyes on energy and health care policy. Here's a preview of what could be an unusually productive year in Washington.

og.description: A new year brings new possibility for Alaskas lawmakers, who have their eyes on energy and health care policy. Here's a preview of what could be an unusually productive year in Washington.
og.title: What DC has in store for Alaska in 2016

article_summary:
"We've got a lot going on with microgrids, as we know, and I want my colleagues to see what life is like in an Arctic environment.
"I'm hopeful that we will not only get some members of the committee out there but also some interesting guests to testify.
While Bethel is much south of the Arctic Circle, when you look at how the Arctic is defined on our map, it includes that coastline there," Murkowski said.
We have our invites out."
